description: This file contains a C implementation of a function that constructs a JSON string representing a feedback object, used for database insertion requests in an Open vSwitch (OVS) database API context. It references JSON parsing via the jansson library and interacts with specific project headers. The function 'fb_insert_to_json' takes feedback data and a unique ID to generate a JSON command string.

methods.name: char * fb_insert_to_json(Feedback * feedback,const char * unique_id)
methods.description: Constructs a JSON string representing feedback data for inserting into the OVS database, including error handling for missing parameters and JSON object creation.
